text: Neurodevelopmentalist may refer to: * A person in the field of pediatric neuropsychology * A person in the field of pediatric psychiatry * a person certified by the Neuro-Developmental Treatment Association to practice techniques based on the Bobath concept * a person certified by the National Academy of Child Development or the International Christian Association of Neurodevelopmentalists to practice certain kinds of techniques based on psychomotor patterning
title: Neurodevelopmentalist
